name: curren$ee
description: A budgeting app built with the MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js (MERN) stack. Worked on a team of 3 for this project. Users can login to their own accounts and enter their income and expenses, search for products on Walmart.com and add them to their budget, view stock and crypto charts, and visualize their money flow over time with a table and multiple charts.
tech: React, React-Router, Node.js, Material-UI, Prime-React, Chart.js, MongoDB, Express, Axios, Moment.js, Passport, Mongoose, Reactstrap, Concurrently, Walmart API, react-tradingview

name: Sounds (Front End)
description: A base to make a soundboard for anything. Another developer can clone this project and create their own soundboard in 2 steps as everything is dynamically created. Download below and test it out with your favorite TV show or movie as a theme.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Animate.css

name: Sounds (Full Stack)
description: Building on top of the front end version, this version adds a backend using the Django REST Framework and PostgreSQL to manage data for the soundboards. Easily expandable by creating new Django apps for different themes.
tech: Python, Django, Django REST Framework, WhiteNoise, Gunicorn, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Animate.css

name: Perfecto Importers
description: A full stack application built for a wine importer. End product will allow potential customers and wine buyers to learn about the company and their wine portfolio and calculate costs of a potential order. It will also allow the owner of the company to easily add wines to the database through an admin panel.
tech: React, Bulma, Axios, React-Router, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Django REST Framework

name: Live Chat
description: A work in progress live chat app built with React and Firebase. Users can sign up and chat in various rooms that can only be made my admins. Image uploading is handled with Cloudinary and link, image, video (mp4), audio (mp3) urls will display their content inline.
tech: React, React Hook and Context APIs, react-router-dom, Reactstrap, Recompose, Emoji-mart, Moment.js, Firebase

name: Quizzes
description: A set of timed quizzes that can easily be adapted and combined by changing a few lines of code. I created this to get a better understanding of Object Oriented Programming.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Lodash

name: Simple Raffle
description: As simple as adding the entrant's name and number of entries and hitting submit. Allows users to save their entries to local storage and load them with ease. Randomizes multiple times and displays a shuffling animation when picking a winner.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Lodash, Moment.js, FontAwesome

name: Reddit TIL Scraper
description: A scraper for the Reddit TodayILearned subreddit. Allows users to pull latest articles from the subreddit in chronological order and save notes for articles in the Mongo database.
tech: Handlebars, jQuery, Moment.js, Axios, Cheerio, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose

name: Lottery Generator
description: Generates lottery numbers for Pick 3, Pick 4, Cash 5, Pick, 6, Mega Millions, and Powerball. Uses an algorithm to display a tooltip of other combinations (box, wheel) of a generated number for Pick 3 or Pick 4.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Lodash, Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Animate.css
